Creating file systems

Create file systems so that you can create shares and exports.

Before you begin

Create file pools and virtual file servers.

Procedure

  1. Click the plus sign (+) on the File Systems page to open the Create File System page.
  2. Select a virtual file server.
    1. Enter a label up to 255 alphanumeric characters.
    2. Select a format:
      • Virtual Machine (4K):
      • Database (32K):
  3. Enter capacity from 1 to 1023 gigabytes.
  4. Select a pool and click Submit.

    A job is added to the Jobs page to create the file system.
